name: Feature Box Addon for WPBakery Page Builder (formerly Visual Composer)
author: themebon

sections.description:
Checkout our Latest WordPress Themes – 100% Free

Awesome way to show your features inside wpbakery page builder with various styles. 5 amazing layouts fully integrated with WPBakery Page Builder. Create custom pages in seconds with this fully customizable feature box bundle.

Live Demo | Get Pro Version

Features

  • 5 modern Feature Boxes to choose from
  • 850+ Google fonts for heading and description
  • Unlimited colors for icon, heading, content
  • Font awesome icons
  • Advanced Typography
  • 100% Responsive
  • Easy to customize
  • CSS3 effects
  • Tons of customization options
  • SEO friendly
  • Easy user interface
  • Works with any theme
  • All Major browser supported
sections.installation:
Installing this plugin as regular wordpress plugin. First you need to install WPBakery Page Builder formerly Visual Composer plugin then install Feature Box Addon for WPBakery Page Builder.

This addon plugin works like other page builder addon plugin. Go to new page then click on WPBakery Page Builder builder then click on Add Element you should see menu as Name “Feature Box” on Menu Top, click on it you will see Feature Box styles then click on it and customize according to your needs.
